data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shi, Jian-Ping, Liu, Zhi-Wei, Li, Bao-Ping (2016): Two new species and a key to nine species of the genus Mongolotettix Rehn, 1928 from China (Acrididae, Acridoidea, Orthoptera). Zootaxa 4117 (3): 421-428, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4117.3.9
